post_text: May 14, 2015 at 1:06â€¯AM#1Does anyone know what the "Stage" special setting does?This is for presets, and is like the "Default" and "Highlight" settings but does not seem to do anything.I stumbled on this by accident, not sure if it an undocumented feature, something yet to be implemented, or I just haven't figured out it use yet.If anyone knows, please share, if not, don't worry about it.
